At Clapton Craft you can fill 3 ⅓ pint growlers and 1 litre plastic bottles with your choice of eight craft beers straight from the keg. We use a counter-pressure filling system that ensures the beer stays fresh for up to six weeks without any loss of carbonation or freshness. This is the same technology employed by some microbreweries to bottle their beer at the brewery.

Counter-pressure filling works by flooding the growler with Co2 and creating a pressurised environment free of oxygen. Beer is then allowed to flow from the keg into the growler, slowly displacing the Co2. As the pressure in the growler is kept in balance the growler fills without foaming. Once capped, the beer remains pressurised and inert in the growler, allowing you to drink it whenever and wherever you like in optimum condition.

When you refill your growler you avoid the cost of bottling, meaning growlers can be up to 20% cheaper by volume than pre-packaged beer. We also regularly showcase beers on growler not available in bottle due to their limited or one off nature. Growlers are yours to keep so please take care of them. The best way to do this is to rinse thoroughly with boiling water as soon as it’s empty. Detergent is ok too but requires patience to remove all the suds.
